subject: Brake pedal issue
description_text:
Hey I have a set of simsonn race v3 pedals & my brake sensor is acting up it keeps engaging with no pressure it’s always at 30% even with adjusting the dead zones how can I fix this ? 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi anthony veiga, Please provide your order number along with a video and a photo of the main controller installation. I will help you check the issue. Additionally, you may try connecting the main controller to the metal part of the pedal using screws. Please note that paint on the surface may affect the electrical connection.
